entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Biggar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023
